title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 40.1 - Application forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 40.1 - Application forms

State Regulations

The Liquor Authority will prescribe the form and manner
of filing of applications for renewal of licenses. No application will be
accepted except on the forms and in the manner prescribed by the Liquor

Authority and unless accompanied by the documents hereinafter
prescribed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
40.1

Amended

New

York State Register August 12, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 32, eff. 8/12/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
